name: backend-helm-monorepo

annotations.kubernetes.io/limit-ranger: LimitRanger plugin set: cpu, memory request for container chart-component-a; cpu, memory limit for container chart-component-a
LimitRanger plugin set: cpu, memory request for container chart-component-b; cpu, memory limit for container chart-component-b

manifest:
---
# Source: chart/templates/service.yaml
apiVersion: v1
kind: Service
metadata:
  name: backend-helm-monorepo-chart
  labels:
    helm.sh/chart: chart-0.1.0
    app.kubernetes.io/name: chart
    app.kubernetes.io/instance: backend-helm-monorepo
    app.kubernetes.io/version: "1.16.0"
    app.kubernetes.io/managed-by: Helm
spec:
  type: ClusterIP
  ports:
    - port: 80
      targetPort: http
      protocol: TCP
      name: http
  selector:
    app.kubernetes.io/name: chart
    app.kubernetes.io/instance: backend-helm-monorepo
---
# Source: chart/templates/deployment_component-a.yaml
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: "backend-helm-monorepo-chart-component-a"
  labels:
    helm.sh/chart: chart-0.1.0
    app.kubernetes.io/name: chart
    app.kubernetes.io/instance: backend-helm-monorepo
    app.kubernetes.io/version: "1.16.0"
    app.kubernetes.io/managed-by: Helm
    example.com/component: a
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app.kubernetes.io/name: chart
      app.kubernetes.io/instance: backend-helm-monorepo
      example.com/component: a
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app.kubernetes.io/name: chart
        app.kubernetes.io/instance: backend-helm-monorepo
        example.com/component: a
    spec:
      serviceAccountName: default
      securityContext:
        {}
      containers:
        - name: "chart-component-a"
          securityContext:
            {}
          image: "image-registry.openshift.svc:1000/myproject-dev/helm-component-a:f6db0fd2"
          imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
          env:
          - name: APP_LISTEN_PORT
            value: "8080"
          ports:
            - name: http
              containerPort: 80
              protocol: TCP
          resources:
            {}
---
# Source: chart/templates/deployment_component-b.yaml
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: "backend-helm-monorepo-chart-component-b"
  labels:
    helm.sh/chart: chart-0.1.0
    app.kubernetes.io/name: chart
    app.kubernetes.io/instance: backend-helm-monorepo
    app.kubernetes.io/version: "1.16.0"
    app.kubernetes.io/managed-by: Helm
    example.com/component: b
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app.kubernetes.io/name: chart
      app.kubernetes.io/instance: backend-helm-monorepo
      example.com/component: b
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app.kubernetes.io/name: chart
        app.kubernetes.io/instance: backend-helm-monorepo
        example.com/component: b
    spec:
      serviceAccountName: default
      securityContext:
        {}
      containers:
        - name: "chart-component-b"
          securityContext:
            {}
          image: "image-registry.openshift.svc:1000/myproject-dev/helm-component-b:f6db0fd2"
          imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
          env:
          - name: APP_LISTEN_PORT
            value: "8081"
          ports:
            - name: http
              containerPort: 80
              protocol: TCP
          resources:
            {}

hooks.name: backend-helm-monorepo-chart-test-connection
hooks.manifest:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  name: "backend-helm-monorepo-chart-test-connection"
  labels:
    helm.sh/chart: chart-0.1.0
    app.kubernetes.io/name: chart
    app.kubernetes.io/instance: backend-helm-monorepo
    app.kubernetes.io/version: "1.16.0"
    app.kubernetes.io/managed-by: Helm
  annotations:
    "helm.sh/hook": test
spec:
  containers:
    - name: wget
      image: busybox
      command: ['wget']
      args: ['backend-helm-monorepo-chart:80']
  restartPolicy: Never
